alert.note: Alert for Naranjito (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 06 at 5:03PM ADT until September 06 at 8:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AST THIS EVENING FOR NARANJITO... At 403 PM AST, Emergency Management reported multiple mudslides with flooding. PR-167 is impassible, rescues are underway in Bo. Anares, and additional mudslides were reported in Bo. Guadiana Sector Los Negrory and Bo. Nuevo Sector Mulita. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency Management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses, as well as mudslides. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Naranjito. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
